main event: A single bright white object with flashes of red and green was observed high in the sky above the mountains for about 10 minutes.
interesting points: The object appeared to have flames or green 'portholes' around it.
The object first moved straight forward, then reversed its direction.
The object was observed by 12 people on the ground.
The object slowly disappeared to the north.
No sound was reported from the object.
sighted object: a single bright white object with flashes of red and green
